faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Got questions? We've got answers. Explore our most common inquiries about AutoBooks ERP.
faq.q1: What types of companies is AutoBooks suitable for?
faq.a1: Whether you're a startup, SME, or enterprise group, AutoBooks fits perfectly. We've optimized specifically for Hong Kong and Greater China businesses, supporting multi-currency, multi-company consolidation, and full compliance with local tax regulations.
faq.a2: Absolutely. We use bank-grade 256-bit encryption, with data stored on ISO 27001 certified cloud servers. Multi-factor authentication ensures only authorized personnel can access sensitive data.
faq.q3: How long does it take to get started?
faq.a3: Most users complete basic setup and start using AutoBooks within 30 minutes. We offer free one-on-one onboarding assistance to help you migrate data from your old system painlessly.
faq.q4: Can it integrate with my existing systems?
faq.a4: Of course! AutoBooks provides open APIs that integrate seamlessly with common banks, e-commerce platforms, and POS systems. Our technical team can also create custom integration solutions for you.
faq.q5: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.a5: Yes, no long-term contracts required. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your subscription at any time. After cancellation, your data can still be exported and saved.
faq.a6: Our AI boasts 99% accuracy in expense categorization and invoice processing. Through machine learning, it gets smarter with use and can even predict cash flow trends to help you make better decisions.
faq.a7: Yes! We support 150+ global currencies with real-time exchange rate updates. Multi-currency transactions are automatically converted with exchange gains/losses calculated in consolidated reports.
faq.a8: Absolutely. AutoBooks allows you to manage unlimited companies under one account. Easily switch between entities and generate consolidated reports with intercompany eliminations.
